summary: Comprehensive testing of secure authentication and file storage application completed. Backend APIs working well (15/16 tests passed), frontend UI fully functional with beautiful space-themed design, authentication flows working, file management operational.

minor_issues.issue: Executable file blocking returns 520 error instead of proper 400 error with message
minor_issues.impact: Error handling for blocked files not user-friendly
minor_issues.details: Security feature works (files are blocked) but error response is generic 500/520 instead of specific 400 with proper message

integration_issues.issue: Registration success message may not always display properly
integration_issues.details: Registration works (backend confirms success) but frontend success message display is inconsistent

passed_tests: Login with invalid credentials (proper error handling)
File upload UI with drag-and-drop support

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major flows working, minor display issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix multer error handling in /app/backend/routes/files.js to return proper 400 error with message instead of generic 500/520 for blocked executable files. Optionally investigate registration success message display consistency.
